body: Thankyou, reading this doujin is like my dream in reality fulfilled. I didn't know what to do when the distance between Senpai and me was continuously getting further. At last I'm still single and lost a circle of friends. Over half a year has passed but I'm still sort of suicidal. Cried a lot after this doujin.
P6 and P25 is the best when it highlights her emotions so well. Her blushing more and more is also really cute.
I thought those were her tiddies on the cover page at first
